note.p: Under-gamekeeper. Son of James and Rebecca Stigwood of Stetchworth, Cambridgeshire. In Down, Kent, 1861; labourer, 1871. Gardener in Farnborough, Kent, 1881. In Bromley Workhouse, 1901.

Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/71/8/5/5), 1851 (HO107/1762/81/12), 1861 (s.v. Hegwood) (RG9/462/73/8), 1871 (RG10/875/40/14), 1881 (RG11/858/88/36), 1901 (RG13/692/81/11)
